mapper.sql: member_wallet_idx, member_wallet_type, member_wallet_seller, member_wallet_btc, member_wallet_krw, member_wallet_datetime, txid, btc_address, member_idx, member_id, member_wallet_seller_idx
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from TA_MEMBER_WALLET
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into TA_MEMBER_WALLET
member_wallet_idx,
member_wallet_type,
member_wallet_seller,
member_wallet_btc,
member_wallet_krw,
member_wallet_datetime,
txid,
btc_address,
member_idx,
member_id,
member_wallet_seller_idx,
#{memberWalletIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{memberWalletType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{memberWalletSeller,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{memberWalletBtc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{memberWalletKrw,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{memberWalletDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{txid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{btcAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{memberIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{memberWalletSellerIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update TA_MEMBER_WALLET
member_wallet_idx = #{record.memberWalletIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_wallet_type = #{record.memberWalletType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_wallet_seller = #{record.memberWalletSeller,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_wallet_btc = #{record.memberWalletBtc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_wallet_krw = #{record.memberWalletKrw,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_wallet_datetime = #{record.memberWalletDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
txid = #{record.txid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
btc_address = #{record.btcAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_idx = #{record.memberIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_id = #{record.memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_wallet_seller_idx = #{record.memberWalletSellerIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update TA_MEMBER_WALLET set member_wallet_idx = #{record.memberWalletIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_wallet_type = #{record.memberWalletType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_wallet_seller = #{record.memberWalletSeller,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_wallet_btc = #{record.memberWalletBtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_wallet_krw = #{record.memberWalletKrw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_wallet_datetime = #{record.memberWalletDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, txid = #{record.txid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, btc_address = #{record.btcAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_idx = #{record.memberIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_id = #{record.memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_wallet_seller_idx = #{record.memberWalletSellerIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update TA_MEMBER_WALLET
member_wallet_type = #{memberWalletType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_wallet_seller = #{memberWalletSeller,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_wallet_btc = #{memberWalletBtc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_wallet_krw = #{memberWalletKrw,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_wallet_datetime = #{memberWalletDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
txid = #{txid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
btc_address = #{btcAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_idx = #{memberIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_wallet_seller_idx = #{memberWalletSellerIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where member_wallet_idx = #{memberWalletIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update TA_MEMBER_WALLET set member_wallet_type = #{memberWalletType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_wallet_seller = #{memberWalletSeller,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_wallet_btc = #{memberWalletBtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_wallet_krw = #{memberWalletKrw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_wallet_datetime = #{memberWalletDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, txid = #{txid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, btc_address = #{btcAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_idx = #{memberIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_wallet_seller_idx = #{memberWalletSellerIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER} where member_wallet_idx = #{memberWalletIdx,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(*) from TA_MEMBER_WALLET where member_idx=#{memberIdx}
select * from TA_MEMBER_WALLET where member_idx=#{memberIdx} order by member_wallet_idx desc limit #{page}, 10

select * from TA_MEMBER_WALLET where
member_wallet_datetime between "${startDate} 00:00:00" and "${endDate} 23:59:59"
and
member_idx="${memberIdx}"
and
( member_wallet_type like "%${searchWord}%" or member_wallet_seller like "%${searchWord}%" or member_id like "%${searchWord}%" )
order by member_wallet_idx desc limit #{page}, 10

select count(*) from TA_MEMBER_WALLET
where member_wallet_datetime between "${startDate} 00:00:00" and "${endDate} 23:59:59"
and
member_idx="${memberIdx}"
and
( member_wallet_type like "%${searchWord}%" or member_wallet_seller like "%${searchWord}%" or member_id like "%${searchWord}%" )
order by member_wallet_idx desc
select * from TA_MEMBER_WALLET order by member_wallet_idx desc limit #{page}, 10

select * from TA_MEMBER_WALLET where
member_wallet_datetime between "${startDate} 00:00:00" and "${endDate} 23:59:59"
and
( member_wallet_type like "%${searchWord}%" or member_wallet_seller like "%${searchWord}%" or member_id like "%${searchWord}%"
)
order by member_wallet_idx desc limit #{page}, 10

select count(*) from TA_MEMBER_WALLET
where member_wallet_datetime between "${startDate} 00:00:00" and "${endDate} 23:59:59"
and
( member_wallet_type like "%${searchWord}%" or member_wallet_seller like "%${searchWord}%" or member_id like "%${searchWord}%" )
order by member_wallet_idx desc
